info.name: Stargate-OSS-Astra-REST-API:users_keyspace
info.description:
Sample schema and queries for Stargate's REST API using:

keyspace: users_keyspace
table: users

item.name: Create a auth token (Stargate OSS only)
Create a simple keyspace users_keyspace (Stargate OSS only)
Create a keyspace with replica set to 1 (Stargate OSS only)
Create a keyspace users_keyspace_dcs with DCs  (Stargate OSS only)
Create a user-defined type (UDT) called address

item.name: Get a listing of all tables with defined columns
Get a listing of all columns in table users

body.raw:
{
    "firstname": "{{user1fn}}",
    "lastname": "{{user1ln}}",
    "favorite_color": "blue",
    "favorite_books": "{ 'Native Son', 'The Joy Luck Club' }",
    "top_three_tv_shows": "[ 'The Magicians', 'The Librarians', 'Supergirl' ]",
    "evaluations": "{ '2020':'excellent', '2019':'brilliant' }",
    "current_country": "( 'USA', '2000-01-01', '2021-04-01' )"
}
